import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { message } from 'antd' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { authConstants } from '../../Constants' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import './RegisterPage.css' const RegisterPage = () => { const authenticated = useSelector(state => state.auth.authenticated) const dispatch = useDispatch() const history = useHistory() const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState('') const [lastName, setLastName] = useState('') const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [stateId, setStateId] = useState('') const [city, setCity] = useState('') const [classId, setClassId] = useState('') useEffect(() => { console.log(classId, stateId) }, [classId]) const handleRegister = async e => { e.preventDefault() if (phoneNumber.length < 10) { message.error('Please enter a valid phone number') return } try { const response = await window.fetch( 'https://api.basidialearning.com/api/v1/basidia-learning/admin/sign-up', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ firstName, lastName, phoneNumber, email, password, stateId, classId, city }) } ) const result = await response.json() if (result.error) { throw result.error } dispatch({ type: authConstants.LOAD_USER_PROFILE, payload: { id: result.success.payload.id, firstName: result.success.payload.firstName, email: result.success.payload.email, phoneNumber: result.success.payload.phoneNumber, city: result.success.payload.city, state: result.success.payload.stateId, class: result.success.payload.classId, phoneVerified: result.success.payload.phoneVerified, emailVerified: result.success.payload.emailVerified, profilePic: result.success.payload.profilePic } }) window.localStorage.setItem('token', result.success.token) window.localStorage.setItem( 'user', JSON.stringify(result.success.payload) ) message.success('Registered Successfully') } catch (err) { console.log(err) message.error(err.message) } } useEffect(() => { if (authenticated) { history.push('/') } }, [authenticated, history]) return (

Create a new account

setFirstName(e.target.value)} value={firstName} required /> setLastName(e.target.value)} value={lastName} required /> setPhoneNumber(e.target.value)} value={phoneNumber} minLength='10' required /> setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} required /> setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} minLength='8' required />
setCity(e.target.value)} value={city} style={{ width: '48%' }} required />
history.push('/login')} style={{ color: '#999', textDecoration: 'underline' }} > Already have an account? Sign In

Welcome Back!

To keep connected with us please login with your personal info

) } export default RegisterPage
